description:
Pairs Puzzle: Shapes is a classic matching pairs game where the player must flip the cards to find all the matching pairs.

The game is currently split into eight categories and also has a random mode which selects cards from each category. Each category has at least 15 different cards, in total there are over 150 different cards! 

Each time you play the cards are randomly selected from the chosen category and laid out in a random order giving 1000’s of possible game variations and hours of fun! The game keeps track of your score and plays a sound each time a correct pair is matched. When all pairs are found the player receives a round of applause.

The game also contains buttons to reset the current game or load a new random game from the current category.

The game contains four difficulty modes from very easy to difficult:
- 3 pairs
- 6 pairs
- 9 pairs
- 12 pairs

The game has been designed to appeal to young children and the cards are bright and colourful and all the menus and buttons are child friendly. However this classic matching pairs game can be enjoyed by people of all ages.

Fruit shapes include:
Apples, apricot, banana, cherries, grapes, lemon, melon, orange, pear, plum & more

Transport shapes include:
Aeroplanes, bike, boats, cars, helicopter, lorry, van, train & more

Music shapes include:
Drum, guitars, keyboard, microphone, piano, trumpet, violin & more

Produce shapes include:
Asparagus, beetroot, carrot, chillis, corn, garlic, mushroom, onion, pepper, pumpkin, tomato & more

Out at sea shapes include:
Anchor, crab, diver, dolphin, lobster, octopus, prawns, seahorse, shells, squid, starfish & more

Garden shapes include:
Beetle, bee, butterfly, caterpillar, flowers, grasshopper, ladybird, spider, tools & more

Building Site shapes include:
A range of construction vehicles & tools

Weather shapes include:
Sun, rain, wind, snow, lightning, rainbow & more

Random mode:
Random shapes selected from any of the eight available categories
